title: McCabe kept notes on interactions with Trump - source
text:
McCabe kept notes on interactions with Trump - source 3:13pm EDT - 01:51 
Andrew McCabe, the former deputy director at the Federal Bureau of Investigation fired by U.S. Attorney General Jeff Sessions on Friday, kept detailed notes about his interactions with President Donald Trump, according to a source familiar with the matter.   
Andrew McCabe, the former deputy director at the Federal Bureau of Investigation fired by U.S. Attorney General Jeff Sessions on Friday, kept detailed notes about his interactions with President Donald Trump, according to a source familiar with the matter.  //reut.rs/2pl5xnC
